title.narrative: Financing Liveable Habitat for Poor in Low Income States - Technical Assistance for policy and systems strengthening

description.narrative: This activity (Financing Liveable Habitat for Poor in Low Income States - Technical Assistance for policy and systems strengthening) is a component of Financing Liveable Habitat for Poor in Low Income States reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of goods' and a budget of £7,749,627. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Urban development and management. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe, Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India LLP, ICF Consulting Services Ltd, IPE Global Private Limited, KPMG India, KPMG LLP, National Housing Bank, PwC. The start date is 02-04-2012 and the end date is 31-01-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
